channel.title: Comments on: Upgraded to Blogsphere V3 Beta

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Good call Jerry, I've updated the margin on all images to use a 3px margin.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Good call Jerry, I’ve updated the margin on all images to use a 3px margin.

Matt

item.title: By: Jerry Carter
item.dc:creator: Jerry Carter
item.description: <p>Very clean look. Only thing I would adjust in the CSS is the padding / margin on images. It's looking like 0px - would be more readable when text wraps at 2px+.<br /><br />Is it just me or is the JS for the live preview really slow? Could be my doggy work desktop. :-|</p>
item.content:encoded:
Very clean look. Only thing I would adjust in the CSS is the padding / margin on images. It’s looking like 0px – would be more readable when text wraps at 2px+.

Is it just me or is the JS for the live preview really slow? Could be my doggy work desktop. üòê

item.title: By: Kevin Pettitt
item.dc:creator: Kevin Pettitt
item.description: <p>Pretty cool, and nice to know the upgrade went smoothly. I did notice that comments look a little odd in terms of line spacing, separation between comments, etc. Not very readable...probably just a simple CSS issue.<br /><br />BTW - my "five" are posted now <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /><br /><br />{ <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.lotusguru.com/lotusguru/LGBlog.nsf/d6plinks/JDOZ-6XCBW4"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.lotusguru.com/lotusguru/LGBlog.nsf/d6plinks/JDOZ-6XCBW4"</a> rel="nofollow" target ="blank">Link</a> }</p>
item.content:encoded:
Pretty cool, and nice to know the upgrade went smoothly. I did notice that comments look a little odd in terms of line spacing, separation between comments, etc. Not very readable…probably just a simple CSS issue.

BTW – my “five” are posted now http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />
